entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Otherwise clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 8:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
